summary: Theory of Obscurity tells the story of the renegade sound and video collective known as The Residents. A story that spans 40 years and is clouded in mystery. Many details surrounding the ... See full summary Â»
cast: Jerry Casale|Les Claypool|Chris Combs|Nolan Cook|Carla Fabrizio|Jon Fishman|Matt Groening|Jerry Harrison|Molly Harvey|Penn Jillette|Jim Knipfel|Gary Panter|The Residents|Steve Seid

title: Theory of Obscurity: A Film About the Residents
